      • getExperiments

        public ExperimentsSnapshot getExperiments(ExperimentsSnapshot snapshot)

        Requests new experiments from the source, parsing the response into experiments

        Parameters:
        snapshot - list of already downloaded experiments (in order to process a diff response, for example)
        Returns:
        modified list of experiments
